questions.question: 'THIS TYPE OF WORK HOLDING UP HUMAN FOLLIES TO HUMOROUS CRITICISM WAS ONCE DIVIDED INTO "GENTLE" OR "INDIGNANT"'

'THIS COMPUTER LANGUAGE GETS OXYMORONIC WHEN IT FOLLOWS "ADVANCED"'

final-jeopardy.question: 'OF THE 7 MEN PICTURED ON THE FRONT OF CURRENTLY PRINTED U.S. CURRENCY, THE 3 WHO NEVER LIVED IN THE WHITE HOUSE'
final-jeopardy.answer: Benjamin Franklin, Alexander Hamilton & George Washington
